item.description:
There is nothing in life that gives more joy or more sorrow than a relationship with another person. So many questions arise:

1. Does this person love me?
2. Do I love this person?
3. Can I love two people at the same time?
4. Is it always going to be like this? Nothing ever changes!
5. Will this person ever change the way I want?
6. How can I improve sexual relationship with this person?
7. If it was not for this person would my life be different?
8. Is this person my soulmate?
9. Will I ever find the right person?

Within the context of this highly interactive workshop we will be using tantric and ayurvedic wisdom to find answers to these questions. You will realize new things about yourself and learn how explore, heal, transform and deepen your present relationships or create new relationships in a vedic way.

If not now, when? – Talmud

Love to all sentient beings,
Saraswati

2pm-5pm
$25
item.name: Relationship Alchemy – Vedic Way
